part.content: CHAPTER II : SOLEMNIZATION OF SPECIAL MARRIAGES. Sec. 4 - 14.
CHAPTER III : REGISTRATION OF MARRIAGES CELEBRATED IN OTHER FORMS. Sec. 15 - 18.
CHAPTER IV : CONSEQUENCES OF MARRIAGE UNDER THIS ACT. Sec. 19 - 21A.
CHAPTER V : RESTITUTION OF CONJUGAL RIGHTS AND JUDICIAL SEPARATION. Sec. 22 - 23.
CHAPTER VI : NULLITY OF MARRIAGE AND DIVORCE. Sec. 24 - 30.
CHAPTER VII : JURISDICTION AND PROCEDURE. Sec. 31 - 41.
